name: Vera Molnar Recreation
description: Recreation of Vera Molnar's grid-based generative drawings, made with the help of Garrit's tutorial. Randomized squares showcase variation and portray a sense of organized chaos.

name: Vera Molnar 1st Variation
description: Built on the recreation, this variation uses three hues of green to create a calmer feel.

name: Vera Molnar 2nd Variation
description: Squares are replaced with blue circles and reduced jitter to create a more controlled look.

name: Perlin Noise Recreation
description: Recreation of a Perlin noise field based on Garrit's example. Circles vary in size, creating an interesting texture.

name: Perlin Noise 1st Variation
description: Playing around with the recreation, this variation uses green and brown hues to portray a camouflage or reptile skin pattern.

name: Perlin Noise 2nd Variation
description: An animated variation in blue tones that resembles a moving sea. Press anywhere on the canvas to create a random synth sound.

name: Flow Field Recreation
description: Particles follow directions from a noise-based vector field (adapted from Garrit's example), leaving trails as they move.

name: Flow Field 1st Variation
description: Building on the recreation, this variation of a flow field features two harmonizing colors that follow randomized directions, producing a dynamic pattern.

name: Flow Field 2nd Variation
description: This variation of the flow field features fewer agents and a warm yellow-orange palette, producing sunray-like trails.
